name: Qubic Tank
description:
Lets whack em all to protect the mystery egg!

Compatible Browsers:
Google Chrome & Mozilla Firefox

Game Controls:
Move Direction  - W, A, S, D
Shoot - Mouse Left Click
Active Shield - Press "Space Bar"
Pick Up Power - Press "E"

Power Info:


CategoryTypeMax Stack LevelsBulletSpeed 3BombPower 3MissileRange 3


In-Game Info:


Shield can be activate when the bar is full. 

The bar will start draining after shield is activated. Once the bar is empty, it will start to recharge again after cool-down.

Player is invulnerable when shield is activated.Elite enemy will drop power once it is destroyed.Player can change their power by picking-up the powers dropped by elite enemy. Pickup the same power to stack the levels.
Portal will appear when all enemies is destroyed. Enter portal to the next stage and ready for the new challenge.
